attributes.review: This app took too long download and it started to track me and started to control certain things in my house online my tv got up and hugged me and my phone started ringing and it was a call from my local Mc.donalds and then my tv downstairs had a random error. That’s when I realized it was bc of this app. This app isn’t worthy at all and this app didn’t help me at all. I feel like the Obama app was wayyyy better hehehhehe #blacklivesmatter.  I heard that the government controls everything if u have this app I would never download this app again. Also trump is a racist ❤️❤️❤️❤️✨ and if u support him u should go dump ur face in some doo doo hehehhehe love yall💅🏽🌝😍😍😍 you did it trump! Don’t do it again💕😙

attributes.review: they ask for too much of my information. like who know what they’ll do with it😰. i recommend that you do not download this app if you want to keep your privacy. also way to many notifications sent to me in only 10 minutes!

attributes.review: Wow. I am truly and utterly disappointed with this app. Do not waste your time hitting download. It took 20 hrs to download and even after that it asked me for my personal information! What happened to privacy and freedom in America! I should have to input my PERSONAL INFO on a public app. You are more than likely to get scammed through this app do not bother.
attributes.title: Disappointed

attributes.review: I don’t know if it’s from all of the people downloading it, but I couldn’t use it at all, I think I will have nightmares after seeing such an atrocity in my screen.
